overview: Misty wanted to unwind in Mr. Ashley’s tub, after watching the kids, how was she to know he would come home early and want to join her. Mr. Porker keeps getting caught cheating with the babysitter and looks he's heading for divorce. This man is addicted to that tight young sitter pussy. How come some guys never learn? And god bless 'em.  Sierra is sitting and listening to some tunes, when the kids’ horny old grandfather stops by. Let's see what the old bastard’s got, wouldn't you know it, he screws her in the ass.
tagline: They will sit your kid and suck your cock all in the same night!
title: The Babysitter 23
